affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"一般状态, 行为", (可转化为动词)
构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 增压；密封；使…加压（pressurize的过去式）
加压的；有使血压增高的；收缩血管的
压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机
密封；增压；使……加压，使……压入

word_mean_info__list.difference: 在科学上，指单位面积上所受到的压力。用于引申时，指某事物所产生的压力或影响力等。
指某人为克服外力界压力而造成的身心和情绪等方面的压抑。用于物时，指任何力或合力作用于一个物体上面造成的应变。
侧重指承受外来的压力，也指由于某种原因而引起的心理、生理或情绪上的紧张。
多指因关系不好或其它原因而出现的紧张状态，也指某物被过度伸展的程度或状态。

word_group.brief_definition: (液体或气体)受压力, 压缩；在(心理)压力下
同侪压力, 朋辈压力
压迫止血点, 压觉点；危机地点 (或局面)
压力锅；高压锅；高度紧张的局势；压力大的任务
压力容器；压力罐；压力容器式核反应堆

bilingual.source: Doctors say too much pressure is not good.
bilingual.target: 医生说太多的压力不好。

bilingual.source: Grades can put unnecessary pressure on students.
bilingual.target: 成绩会给学生带来不必要的压力。

bilingual.source: My parents give me a lot of pressure about school.
bilingual.target: 我的父母给了我很多关于学校的压力。

bilingual.source: The authorities are under pressure to build elephant parks.
bilingual.target: 当局面临建造大象公园的压力。

bilingual.source: Volcanoes are like giant safety valves that release the pressure.
bilingual.target: 火山就像释放压力的巨大安全阀。

bilingual.source: Challenges like this might sometimes put you under pressure.
bilingual.target: 这样的挑战有时可能会让你感到压力。

bilingual.source: You should learn to relax and not put so much pressure on yourself.
bilingual.target: 你应该学会放松，不要给自己太大压力。

bilingual.source: Mr. Meng said that challenges at senior high might put them under pressure.
bilingual.target: 孟先生说高中的挑战可能会给他们带来压力。

bilingual.source: Alice, help me! My parents are giving me too much pressure about school!
bilingual.target: 爱丽丝，帮帮我！我父母给了我太多关于学校的压力！

list.abstract: pressure是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和不及物动词，可以翻译为压力、施加压力，等等。
《Pressure》是缪斯演唱的一首歌曲，于2018年9月27日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Howie's gonna freak out. Parental pressure can be daunting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，华仔会抓狂的。来自父母的压力还真是可怕。

yingyinNormal.en: Pressure. This diamond used to just be a piece of coal that was put under a lot of pressure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 压力啊。这颗钻石以前只是一小块炭，通过高压制成的。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, that's a lot of pressure on me and my uterus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，这让我和我的子宫压力超大。

yingyinNormal.en: At the same time, I want to take some pressure off you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时，我也希望给你们减轻一些压力。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Ok, there's real pressure on now. My mother's in the house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在真的有压力了，因为妈妈在这里。

yingyinNormal.en: It's too much pressure. Maybe I'll try again when I'm older.
yingyinNormal.zh: 压力太大了，或许等我长大一些了再试试吧。

yingyinNormal.en: So as you graduate today, I want to put some pressure on you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你们毕业的今天，我希望给你们一些压力。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: What happened? Well, pressure is force divided by area. The smaller the area, the bigger the pressure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是怎么回事？其实，压强等于压力除以受力面积。受力面积越小，压强就越大。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want to rush him. Too much pressure and he will get traumatized.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想催促他，如果压力太大，他会受到精神创伤的。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, the success of British sport rests on your shoulders now. No pressure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要知道，英国的体育发展就靠你了。别有压力。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, so we just thought we'd stop by and let you know there's still no pressure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们顺路过来是要让你知道，还是不要有压力。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you know I got a question for you. Just a little thing, no pressure. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个问题想要问你，只是件小事啦，没有压力的。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Ross, there is no pressure on you. Okay? I mean you can be as involved as you want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，别觉得有什么压力，好吗？你想怎么做都可以的。

yingyinNormal.en: Just don't put so much pressure on it. It's always a little awkward in the beginning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别给自己那么大压力。这种事一开始总是有点小不顺的嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Augustus, He made his wish meeting you so that we could talk. No pressure. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 奥古斯塔斯，他许愿想要见到你，所以我们才能来。别有压力。嗯。

yingyinNormal.en: And with a ballooning national debt, arms-makers are under pressure like never before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且随着国债不断膨胀，武器制造商也感到了前所未有的压力。

yingyinNormal.en: We say that it has a gravitational pressure, which ordinary matter and dark matter do not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 暗能量具有一种重力压力，这是普通物质和暗物质所不具有的。

yingyinNormal.en: They're from the internal lung pressure building up like if you shake a soda can and pop the top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因肺内的压力不断增加，好比你摇一瓶汽水，就会把瓶盖崩开。

yingyinNormal.en: It really bothers him? Sure. There's still a lot of pressure on guys to be providers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真的会困扰他吗？当然啊，男人都会有这种压力觉得自己必须撑起这头家。

yingyinNormal.en: Not to us. But what if it was someone they cared about even more, that was applying the pressure?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我们是这样，可如果是对方更在意的某个人给他们施加了压力呢？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

sense_info_list.en: the feeling of stressful urgency caused by the necessity of doing or achieving something, especially with limited time

examination_example.sentence: For factory owners, it all adds up to stiff competition for workers – and upward <highlight>pressure</highlight> on wages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对工厂主来说，这一切都意味着争夺工人的激烈竞争，以及工资上涨的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Hill's <highlight>pressure</highlight> later led to the creation of national parks and green belts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随后，希尔的施压促成了国家公园和绿化带的建设。

examination_example.sentence: Rosenberg argues convincingly that public-health advocates ought to take a page from advertisers, so skilled at applying peer <highlight>pressure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗森博格令人信服地指出，公共卫生倡导者应该向善于施加同伴压力的广告商学习。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>pressure</highlight> zoos to spend less on their animals would lead to inhumane outcomes for the precious creatures in their care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迫使动物园减少在动物身上的花费会对园内的珍贵动物造成不人道的后果。

examination_example.sentence: Merely helping a gift-giver gain access to other officials, unless done with clear intent to <highlight>pressure</highlight> those officials, is not corruption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非是为了向这些官员施压，仅仅是帮助送礼者接近其他官员，这不是腐败。

sense_info_list.en: the force applied to a unit area of surface

examination_example.sentence: And stay alert to serious symptoms, such as chest pain or <highlight>pressure</highlight>, severe shortness of breath or dizziness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并对严重症状保持警惕，如胸痛或胸闷、严重呼吸急促或头晕。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"一般状态, 行为", (可转化为动词)
构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

word_usage.usage: 作名词时，意为“压力”，是不可数名词。

作动词时，意为“强迫；迫使”，如：
He will never pressure you to get married.
他永远不会强迫你结婚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

sense_info_list.en: the feeling of stressful urgency caused by the necessity of doing or achieving something, especially with limited time

examination_example.sentence: Even in the face of immense and mounting financial <highlight>pressures</highlight>, some schools have shown remarkable determination and ingenuity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便在与日俱增的巨额财政压力面前，部分学校也还是展现出了非凡的决心与独创力。

examination_example.sentence: The best seek to alleviate the external <highlight>pressures</highlight> on their pupils while equipping them better to understand and handle the world outside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好的方法是减轻学生的外部压力，同时使他们更好地理解和处理外界环境。

examination_example.sentence: When considering risk factors associated with serious chronic diseases, we often think about health indicators such as cholesterol, blood <highlight>pressure</highlight>, and body weight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在考虑与严重的慢性疾病相关的危险因素时，我们经常考虑到的健康指标有: 例如胆固醇，血压和体重。

sense_info_list.en: the use of persuasion, influence, or intimidation to make someone do something

examination_example.sentence: Occasionally, it's because they're <highlight>pressured</highlight> to finish in a short time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候，这是因为他们被迫要在短时间内完成。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
vt. 密封；对…施加压力；增压；（pressurize的过去式）
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

sense_info_list.en: the feeling of stressful urgency caused by the necessity of doing or achieving something; especially with limited time

examination_example.sentence: French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte was known to be unimpressed by the declining taste of early 18th century cooking, but under <highlight>pressure</highlight> to entertain Paris's high society, he too called Creme to his kitchen at Tuileries Palace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众所周知法国皇帝 Napoleon Bonaparte 对18世纪初期衰退的烹饪口味并不感兴趣，但在招待巴黎上流社会的压力下，他也找 Careme 去了他在 Tuileries Palace 的厨房。

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo is to spend billions of dollars to develop drinks and snacks and reformulate existing ones with lower sugar, salt and fat, as consumers demand healthier options and regulatory <highlight>pressure</highlight> intensifies amid an obesity epidemic (流行病) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事可乐(PepsiCo)公司将斥资数十亿美元开发饮料和零食，并重新配制糖，盐和脂肪含量更低的饮料和零食，因为消费者要求更健康的选择，并且在肥胖病流行的情况下，监管压力加剧。

examination_example.sentence: On one side are white parents like Catherine Foley, a former president of the Parent-Teacher-Student Association at her daughter's middle school, who has come to see the district's increasingly <highlight>pressured</highlight> atmosphere as opposed to learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方是像凯瑟琳·福利这样的白人家长，她曾在女儿所在的中学担任家长——教师——学生协会主席。她认为，该学区日益紧张的氛围不利于孩子们学习。

examination_example.sentence: The Italian Culture Ministry says it is unaware of any government efforts to <highlight>pressure</highlight> UNESCO.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 意大利文化部表示，他们不知道政府有没有努力向联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)施加过压力。

examination_example.sentence: What white middle-class parents do not always understand is how much <highlight>pressure</highlight> recent immigrants feel to boost their children into the middle class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白人中产阶级父母不太理解的是，新移民将孩子推入中产阶级要承受多么大的压力。

examination_example.sentence: A drop in oxygen <highlight>pressure</highlight> can cause headaches in certain individuals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 氧气压力下降可能导致某些人头痛。

examination_example.sentence: Although the <highlight>pressure</highlight> of the cabin is adjusted to prevent altitude sickness, you could still experience sleepiness or a headache.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管已调整了机舱压力以防止高原反应，但你仍可能会感到困倦或头痛。

examination_example.sentence: The lower oxygen <highlight>pressure</highlight> found in an aircraft cabin is equivalent to that at 6,000-8,000 feet of altitude.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 飞机机舱内更低的氧气压相当于海拔6000至8000英尺的氧压。

examination_example.sentence: According to the World Health Organization, 80 percent of deaths from heart disease and stroke are caused by high blood <highlight>pressure</highlight>, tobacco use, elevated cholesterol and low consumption of fruits and vegetables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据世界卫生组织的数据，80%死于心脏病和中风的人是由高血压、吸烟、胆固醇升高以及水果和蔬菜食用过少引起的。

examination_example.sentence: There's no question people can take things a long way toward reversing diabetes, reversing high blood <highlight>pressure</highlight>, even preventing cancer by food choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，人们在通过事物选择来逆转糖尿病、逆转高血压，甚至预防癌症方还有很长的路要走。

examination_example.sentence: There are many things that can cause confusion and memory loss, including health problems like temporary stoppage of breathing during sleep, high blood <highlight>pressure</highlight>, or depression, as well as medications (药物) like antidepressants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有很多原因会引起混乱和记忆力减退，包括健康问题，例如睡眠中暂时停止呼吸，高血压或抑郁，以及抗抑郁药等药物。

examination_example.sentence: He's a good friend of mine, and he would never try to <highlight>pressure</highlight> you or cheat you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是我的好朋友，他永远不会强迫你或欺骗你。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

examination_example.sentence: In one European study, participants listened to music as the researchers monitored their heart rates and blood <highlight>pressure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项欧洲研究中，参与者听音乐，同时研究人员监测他们的心率和血压。

examination_example.sentence: As I told my parents at dinner that first night, it was all a little more high-<highlight>pressure</highlight> than I'd expected .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如我在第一天晚上的晚餐上告诉我父母的那样，这一切都比我预想的多一些压力。

examination_example.sentence: This smart keyboard precisely measures the cadence (节奏)with which one types and the <highlight>pressure</highlight> fingers apply to each key.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这款智能键盘能精确测量用户键入的节奏，以及手指在每个键上的按压。

examination_example.sentence: Von Wong hopes that his work will also help <highlight>pressure</highlight> big companies to reduce their plastic footprint.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 冯·王希望他的工作也将有助于向大公司施压，以减少它们的塑料足迹。

examination_example.sentence: Then you discover the <highlight>pressure</highlight> of having to keep up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后你发现必须跟上进度的压力。

examination_example.sentence: There is a great deal of <highlight>pressure</highlight> to master one's field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要精通自己的领域，压力很大。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；迫切的；恳切的；急切的；热切的
n. 压力；压迫；影响；压强；压迫感；影响力

word_family.mean: v. 压；榨；挤；压平；熨平；竭力要求；坚持；强调；征用；临时使用

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (液体或气体)受压力；压缩；在(心理)压力下

examination_example.sentence: Doctors say too much <highlight>pressure</highlight> is not good for a child’s development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生说太多的压力不利于孩子的成长。

examination_example.sentence: And he’ll have less <highlight>pressure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样他的压力就会小一些。

examination_example.sentence: Getting on with animals can help lower animals’ blood <highlight>pressure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与动物相处可以帮助降低动物的血压。
